items.question: How do I start building my tree?
items.answer: Just click the "Start" button on the homepage and add the first family member.

items.question: Is my tree saved automatically?
items.answer: No, you decide whether to save the tree or not. You can save the tree in your browser's memory or download it to your device as a JSON file.

items.question: Can I share my tree with relatives?
items.answer: Yes, you can download the JSON file of the tree and send it to your relative.

sections.content: Add individual family nodes or build an entire tree. For each node, you can add the ancestor’s name, a link to an image or related resource, and additional information. Nodes are displayed as cards with your information.
You can style individual nodes, branches, or the entire tree. Various colors, sizes, and layouts are available.
Download your tree in JSON format to save it on your device. You can also export the tree as an image (PNG) or SVG. Share the JSON file with relatives or friends so they can load it in their browser.
All data is stored only in your browser’s memory. We do not store any information on the server, so saving the tree on your device is the only way to keep it safe.
The project is completely free. All features are available without any restrictions.
